title: Ore Dake Kaereru Kurasu Teni - Novel Updates
genre: Action   Adventure   Drama   Fantasy   Romance   Shounen
tags: Bullying   Cheats   Crafting   Depictions of Cruelty   Game Elements   Hard-Working Protagonist   Level System   Magic Beasts   Male Protagonist   Monsters   Multiple Transported Individuals   Returning from Another World   Special Abilities   Survival   Sword And Magic   Transported to Another World   Weak to Strong
author: ANEKO Yusagi   アネコユサギ
description: One day, Hanebashi Yukinari was summoned to another world together with his classmates. His ability『Transfer』 was written on a slate inside a deep forest and it was an ability that can make things move. Classmates that had awakened their abilities one next to the other just like him. And the survival in a different world had suddenly started. Inside the extreme situation……He realized. That only he can go back to Japan.>
